name: MystLyke
description:
This Mist Lyke game is a low polygon role-playing game inspired by the early 90s puzzle games.

FIND THE KEY -> OPEN THE PORTAL

Transport to a world of wonder! Find your way through mazes and portals and most importantly fall to your death!

Contents:

The first level is an introductory level which shows the user the different parts of the game.

Level 2 is a grid like system, standing on the incorrect tile means you will fall to your death.

  *Hint: Use the Islands as clues where the Trees represents the order of the  clues, the islands show the course and the rocks show the number of steps.

Level 3 is a maze with two exits

Made for the KiwiJam 2018
